title: There’s Another Prévôt Sister, and She’s Racing U.S. Gravel
content:
Meet Axelle Dubau-Prévôt, Pauline's younger sister, who will compete in Unbound Gravel, Leadville, and the other Life Time Grand Prix events in 2025

Read the full article at There’s Another Prévôt Sister, and She’s Racing U.S. Gravel on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
